author: donaldp
msg: This patch forces property setting to follow the same rules as the rest of ant in most tasks. The few tasks where we have not forced immutability will instead get 3 line ugly warnings telling them that they should upgrade or not use the same property name etc.
The reason for just warning them is backwards compatability.

author: bodewig
msg: New task <waitfor> that waits until a given condition gets true or a
As a side effect, <condition> gains two new conditions.  This also
means we now have a way to check whether we are on a networked system
and run/omit testcases that require network to be established based on
